sub_title: Group Technical Authority - Materials & Corrosion Protection at SBM Offshore
summary:
Specialised in Oil and Gas FPSO Topsides Processing and utility system materials engineering related activities.

Well verse in materials engineering, corrosion, corrosion protection, oil and gas processing system (Offshore E&P and Onshore refinery), and metallurgical analysis.

More than 12 years professional experience, registered professional engineer with Board of Engineers Malaysia.

Function as Lead Materials & Corrosion Engineer during project execution. Completed 4 major FPSO Conversion built EPCIC FPSO projects, 2 Brownfield FPSO Project, 1 Sour Gas Processing Jack-up platform project, and technical Offshore Query support to SBM Group operating units around the globe (FPSOs/Platforms). Influencer in Failure analysis activity and material selection/ corrosion subjects within SBM Offshore group. 

Active and continuously involved in new project proposals, Front End Engineering Design (FEED) and design optimisation activity for various offshore production system facilities.

Passionate in motivating young engineers, encourage open discussion, able to make decision with solid justifications and always looking for new ideas/improvements.
